portfolio.title: ‚ö° Who am i to talk about this? ‚ö°
portfolio.text: Honestly i am no one, i've just been coding for 3 years now and i like to document every solutions to every problem i encounter. Extracting as much code snippets and tutorials i can so that if i ever need it again i just have to pop back here and get a quick refresher.
portfolio.subtext: Feel free to me through this learning journey by providing any feedback and if you wanna support me:

thankYou.title: üéÅ Thank you so much for your ! üéÅ
thankYou.text: Honestly i am so grateful, this will help me get going on sharing my personal knowledge knowing it also helps others!
